name: Secret of Mana: Relocalized
overview: Secret of Mana -Relocalized- is an attempt to relocalize, update, and uncensor Secret of Mana. This patch is an addendum to FuSoYa’s Variable Width Font Edition of the game. The decision to use FuSoYa’s VWF as a base for my own was made early on for a couple of reasons. Primarily, because FuSoYa’s VWF hack is the only English VWF hack in town and secondly, because it is well regarded as a classic and is considered by many to be the definitive version of the game in English. This hack updates almost anything with a name on it. Including characters, weapons, spells, elementals, armor, items, towns, monsters, bosses. It also removes all of the game’s religious censorship in both the game’s naming assets and the script. There are a few typos and some other minor script elements that are modified here and there as well.
